entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Drizzle. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Drizzle ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
